name: custom-element-showcase
description: An example that use that demonstrates the custom elements from @dojo/widgets and themes from @dojo/themes

scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir dist && shx cp src/index.html dist && shx cp -r node_modules/@webcomponents/custom-elements dist && shx cp -r node_modules/@dojo/widgets/dist dist/widgets && shx cp -r node_modules/@dojo/widgets/theme dist/themes
